text:
[Verse]
Neon lights glow in the night
City streets come alive
Dancing shadows by my side
Lost in rhythm we thrive

[Verse 2]
Bright signs flash dreams so high
People rush they can't deny
Laughter echoes through the air
Life shows up everywhere

[Chorus]
Under the neon lights we shine
Every heartbeat keeping time
Together we ignite the night
Under the neon lights so bright

[Verse 3]
Colors paint the darkened skies
Hopes and wishes in our eyes
Traffic hums a steady beat
On this pavement feel the heat

[Chorus]
Under the neon lights we shine
Every heartbeat keeping time
Together we ignite the night
Under the neon lights so bright

[Bridge]
Hold my hand don't let it go
In this glow our spirits grow
Every step a brand new show
In the city we both know
title: Under the Neon Lights
